title: Power cut on April 13, 14 unlikely: PUCSL
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) said today that power outages on April 13, 14 are highly unlikely.
They said adequate fuel and furnace oil have been received for power generation and also the demand for power predicted to be low during the week-long holidays. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
